tool_description: An API showing latest update on EV trends
name: Electric Vehicle Updates
title: Electric Vehicle Updates

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source Updates
api_list.description: Get updates on EV from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-updates.p.rapidapi.com/evupdates/mint"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://electric-vehicle-updates.p.rapidapi.com/evupdates/{pubid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "electric-vehicle-updates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All EV updates
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all new updates on EV
